channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who should get the Citi Strata Card?
item.description: The Citi Strata Card can be a solid addition to any credit card portfolio. Here's who should consider adding the Strata to their wallet.

item.title: Deal alert: Fly to Madrid, Paris and other European cities from $323 round-trip
item.description: British Airways is offering flights to European cities like Madrid and Paris for as low as $323, along with steep discounts on vacation packages.

item.title: Looking for the perfect winter vacation? 4 reasons why Windstar Cruises should be on your short list
item.description: With Windstar Cruises' "Travel Is Better When You're All-In" deal, you'll find excellent values for sailings this autumn and winter.

item.title: How to earn up to 20,000 bonus World of Hyatt points this fall
item.description: Earn up to 20,000 bonus World of Hyatt points by staying at U.S. Hyatt Regency locations this fall.

item.title: How to redeem Marriott Bonvoy points for maximum value
item.description: Explore the various ways to use and maximize your Marriott points, such as on hotel reservations, flights and purchases through shopping portals.
